title: Library include does not store relative path
description: When a library is included in a report design, the BIRT designer does not generate nor save a relative path for the library. This causes issues when the project is moved or the library is accessed from a different location.
OB: The BIRT designer does not generate or save a relative path for libraries included in a report design.
EB: The BIRT designer should generate and save a relative path for libraries included in a report design, ensuring that the path remains valid even when the project is moved or the library is accessed from a different location.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Create a new report design in the BIRT designer.
2. Include a library in the report design.
3. Save the report design.
4. Move the project folder to a different location or access the library from a different location.
5. Open the report design again and check the path of the included library. It should be a relative path starting from the project folder.
